text:
January 12, 1951
Mr* John C* Crabbe
Director of Radio
Collage of Pacific
Stockton, California
Dear John*
I was glad to see your note of January 9, addressed
to Leo Martin, There has been a great deal of discussion
over the past year or so about the possibility of a
federation of educational radio organisations, ^his, of
course, is a matter which would have to be explored and
studied by the MAEB Board of Directors#
I would be happy to talk to you at Columbus, but
such a discussion would have no validity unless or until
it becomes of inbarest to our own Board of Directors,
Hth all best wishes, I am
Cordially yours.
Seymour H. Siegel
President, NAEB
SBSt&s
co* Ausraus
Bull
COPY
